detail_desc: Short, A-line dress in a crêpe weave with spaghetti shoulder straps and gathered tiers.
Short, A-line dress in a crêpe weave with spaghetti shoulder straps and gathered tiers.

Wide tunic in an airy weave made from a cotton blend with a small stand-up collar, buttons at the top, a double-layered yoke and gathered seams at the shoulders and neck. Gently dropped shoulders, long, voluminous sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a seam at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Wide tunic in an airy weave made from a cotton blend with a small stand-up collar, buttons at the top, a double-layered yoke and gathered seams at the shoulders and neck. Gently dropped shoulders, long, voluminous sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a seam at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Ankle-length trousers in twill with a soft brushed finish. Elasticated waist with a detachable tie belt, side pockets and flap leg pockets. Gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front and ribbed trims around the neckline and armholes.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front and ribbed trims around the neckline and armholes.

Set with a short-sleeved shirt and pair of shorts in a cotton weave. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and a gently rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a back pocket.

Short-sleeved shirt with a waistcoat and bow tie. Shirt in poplin with a collar, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Waistcoat in a cotton and linen weave with fake front pockets and buttons down the front. Bow tie in twill with a slight sheen. The bow tie has an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.

Short-sleeved shirt with a waistcoat and bow tie. Shirt in poplin with a collar, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Waistcoat in a cotton and linen weave with fake front pockets and buttons down the front. Bow tie in twill with a slight sheen. The bow tie has an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.

Short, A-line dress in a crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and gathered seams at the waist and hem creating tiers for added width. Sleeveless jersey underdress.

Short, A-line dress in a crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and gathered seams at the waist and hem creating tiers for added width. Sleeveless jersey underdress.

Short, A-line dress in a crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and gathered seams at the waist and hem creating tiers for added width. Sleeveless jersey underdress.

Short, A-line dress in a crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and gathered seams at the waist and hem creating tiers for added width. Sleeveless jersey underdress.
Double-layered, rectangular scarf in satin made from recycled polyester.
Double-layered, rectangular scarf in satin made from recycled polyester.
Scarf in an airy weave containing glittery threads with fringes on the sides.

Jumpsuit in an airy viscose and linen weave with a deep V-neck and buttons down the front. Short sleeves with turn-ups, a detachable tie belt at the waist and wide, ankle-length legs with patch pockets at the sides.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and high cut back with a gather.
Captain’s cap in twill made from a cotton blend with a braided cord. Lined.
Captain’s cap in twill made from a cotton blend with a braided cord. Lined.
Set with a top and skirt in soft, organic cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top that is rounded and slightly longer at the back. Tiered skirt with an elasticated waist.
Set with a top and skirt in soft, organic cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top that is rounded and slightly longer at the back. Tiered skirt with an elasticated waist.
Set with a top and skirt in soft, organic cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top that is rounded and slightly longer at the back. Tiered skirt with an elasticated waist.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish and a detachable, faux shearling-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front, a drawstring at the waist and flap side pockets with a press-stud. Inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined in faux shearling lining at the top and a diamond-quilted weave below.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish and a detachable, faux shearling-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front, a drawstring at the waist and flap side pockets with a press-stud. Inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined in faux shearling lining at the top and a diamond-quilted weave below.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish and a detachable, faux shearling-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front, a drawstring at the waist and flap side pockets with a press-stud. Inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined in faux shearling lining at the top and a diamond-quilted weave below.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish and a detachable, faux shearling-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front, a drawstring at the waist and flap side pockets with a press-stud. Inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined in faux shearling lining at the top and a diamond-quilted weave below.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, dropped shoulder seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.

Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Lined hood, low dropped shoulders, extra-long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Straight-style T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Straight-style T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.

Tops in a fine-knit cotton and linen blend with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Seam at the hem with a flounced trim.
Trousers in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend containing some linen. High waist with wide, covered elastication, and flared legs.

Short dress in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated seam under the bust, and a rounded hem. Unlined.

Short dress in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated seam under the bust, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Short dress in mesh with a flock print. Flounce-trimmed yoke at the front, short sleeves with a flounced trim and a flounced trim at the hem. Fitted, sleeveless underdress in jersey.
Shirt in a soft cotton piqué with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Round-necked vest tops in soft jersey made from COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.
Round-necked vest tops in soft jersey made from COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.

Round-necked T-shirts in a soft, stretch cotton blend made from COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre blend that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.

Trunks in stretch jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs. The trunks are made from COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.

Ankle-length jeans in washed, lightweight cotton denim. Slim fit and wide legs. Elasticated, paper bag waist with press-studs, a fake fly and diagonal side pockets. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Fitted blouse in an airy weave with a crêped finish. Pointed collar, buttons down the front and long, voluminous puff sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Lined at the front.
Fitted blouse in an airy weave with a crêped finish. Pointed collar, buttons down the front and long, voluminous puff sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Lined at the front.

Ankle-length boiler suit in soft viscose twill with buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a decorative tab and button. Chest pocket, patch front pockets and a seam with covered elastication and a tie belt at the waist.
Round-necked jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Round-necked jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Round-necked jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Round-necked jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in pleated jersey with a slight sheen. Pleated, stand-up collar, V-shaped opening at the front with ties at the top, and pleated flutter sleeves. Unlined.
Top in pleated jersey with a slight sheen. Pleated, stand-up collar, V-shaped opening at the front with ties at the top, and pleated flutter sleeves. Unlined.
Top in pleated jersey with a slight sheen. Pleated, stand-up collar, V-shaped opening at the front with ties at the top, and pleated flutter sleeves. Unlined.

Dungaree shorts in cotton denim with hard-worn details that are patched on the inside. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a two-part chest pocket, one side with a flap and press-stud, and front and back pockets. Fake fly, and a seam at the waist with press-studs at the sides.
Cropped cardigan in a soft knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbed trims.
Cropped cardigan in a soft knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbed trims.
Jumper in a soft knit with long, wide puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft knit with long, wide puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed turtle neck. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed turtle neck. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
